alert.note: Alert for Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 8:34AM CST until January 12 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Simpson County in central Mississippi... Southern Smith County in central Mississippi... * Until 915 AM CST. * At 834 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shivers, or near Pinola, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Magee and Sanatorium around 850 AM CST. Taylorsville and Center Ridge around 910 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sylvarena and Mize. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for south central and central Mississippi. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
